author: mbk
msg: * tools/cvs2svn/README: Fix a typo noticed by Daniel Bonniot (issue 1636).

author: ringstrom
msg: Use apr_uint32_t for the SSL server certificate failure bits, and
store a pointer to an apr_uint32_t instead of misusing a void*.  Also
define the bits using hex numbers instead of a shifted bit.
(SVN_AUTH_SSL_*): Use a hex number instead of a bit shift.
unsigned long and use %lu in the format string.
Use apr_uint32_t, not int for the failures.  Store a pointer to
apr_uint32_t in the hash instead of misusing a void*.

author: kfogel
msg: Start work on issue #1601: to do deltification unconditionally as part
of the commit, but in the background when possible, so the user
This change prepares code paths for RA layers to choose which style of
deltification is most appropriate.  The actual deltification
(backgrounded or foregrounded) is not implemented yet.  In other
words, don't merge this to trunk yet :-).
(svn_repos_fs_commit_txn): Take new deltify_how enum, leave comment
svn_repos_get_commit_editor, for now, and leave comment about
(create_hooks): Remove call to 'svnadmin deltify' from the
(svn_commit_callback_t): Document that this is invoked only after

author: ringstrom
msg: (svn_auth_save_credentials): Fixed a typo in a comment.
